description.description: The description of the project. Will be used as meta description.

title.description: The title of the project. Will be used as title.

ignore.description: Ignore this project in the project list.

anyOf.description: Enable if project has a npm package,

npm.description: Enable if project has a npm package. If set to true the package name is based on the on the package.json name

workdir.description: The working directory of the project.

readme.description: The path to the readme file. If set to true the readme file is the root readme file.

website.description: The website of the project. If set to `true`, the website is based on repository URL.

replacement.description: The replacement package. If not set, the package is considered deprecated without a replacement.
